configgui.spellchecker.language_check.la: Language locale the mod uses to check your chat messages. [default: EN_US]
configgui.spellchecker.checking.checking: The threshold the mod uses to check how close a word needs to be to the wrongly spelled word. [default: 0]
configgui.spellchecker.general.max_sugge: The maximum number of suggestions it will show you. [default: 4]
configgui.spellchecker.general.show_sugg: Show suggestions live while typing. [default: false]
